transcript:
Customer: Haan ji abhi aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Yes madam boliye. 
Customer: Abhi aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai haan.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai madam boliye. 
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Ek second madam. Abhi dekhiye aapne ispe click kiya. Right? Uske baad aapko list dikh rahi hai niche 19 minute ago.
Customer: To aap keh rahe the na aapko ek
Executive: particular location ka chahiye right sir dekhiye abhi sabhi location fix aati hai aise particular sirf ek ki aaye ye to possible nahi hai.
Customer: Main ye nahi keh raha main keh raha hu jaise maan lijiye Delhi Delhi ho gaya.
Haan ji. Haryana ho gaya. Right. Uttar Pradesh ho gaya. Theek hai? Ji. Okay. Ji. Bas. Iske alawa nahi chahiye.
Executive: To uske liye sabse pehla option hai ki aap filters use kar sakte hain correct location ke liye. Dusra agar aap keh rahe ho ki uski jis location ki mujhe chahiye sabse kam valid matlab bahut kam valid aa rahi hai. To uski valid aapko din mein agar ek do bhi dikh na din pe.
Customer: Main main hamara hamara concern ye hai concern hamara ye hai ki jo leads aa rahi hai wo bahar ki aa rahi hai usse zyada problem hume yaha aa rahi hai. Aur hamara concern nahi hai basically.
Executive: Theek hai to alag location ki aayegi main aapko ye nahi keh sakti hu ki matlab bilkul bhi nahi aayegi. Usi ka solution main bata rahi hu ki aapka na ek cheez hoti hai jaise ki isme 50 location ki aa rahi hai. To isme na ek conversion behavior pe aisa hota hai ki jis tarike ki aap lead consume karte rahoge na ek din mein do teen usi ke hisab se fir zyada aani start ho jati hai. Ab main aapko kahu ki aapko as for example Delhi ki chahiye ye. To Delhi ke ek se ek din mein kam se kam do se teen lead Delhi ki consume kariye aur aap char panch din mein khud se change dekhiyega ki sir Delhi ki sabse zyada lead aapke paas aayengi. Is conversion behavior pe chalta hai aur dusra agar aapko lag raha hai kisi matlab kisi location ki bahut zyada aa rahi hai uski chahiye hi nahi. To usme ek option hai usko not preferred mein add kar dijiye fir uski dheere dheere kam aani start ho jayengi ye do cheez aapko sabse pehle karni hai.
Customer: Not preferred kis mein hai kaha pe hai ye?
Executive: Setting wale option mein jaiye left mein niche.
Customer: Left mein setting kidhar hai ek minute. Haan ji haan ji. Setting to mujhe dikh nahi raha madam. Setting kidhar hai profile hai dashboard hai buyleads hai product hai photo invoice setting. Left mein second option left mein left mein.
Executive: Ek minute. Achha upar hi. Kidhar hai? Ye hai. Haan aap batao is kidhar hai?
Customer: Setting kidhar hai madam?
Executive: Nahi nahi jaha pe wo click kiya tha uske just niche dekhiye idhar idhar idhar.
Customer: Yaha pe?
Executive: Left side matlab nahi dusri side pe jaiye. Right hua na madam ye hua. Nahi right nahi sir left mein udhar. Nahi mera to right hi hua na. Ye hai na ye aa gaya ye khul gaya? Ji.
Executive: Fir last mein wo kariye dobara se upar jaiye. Aur kariye. Scroll kariye niche. Buyleads preference ka option. Niche nahi upar ki side scroll kariye aise. Okay okay sir. Upar jaiye bilkul. One minute haan buyleads alerts buyleads preference. Aur upar jaiye. Business inquiries. Aur scroll kariye aur scroll kar dijiye thoda upar. Upar likha hai buyleads preference fourth option.
Customer: Buyleads haan ye preference preference. Ispe click kariye haan ji.
Executive: Abhi niche jaiye thoda sa. Yaha pe show kar raha hai not preferred location. Haan. Ye dekhiye yaha pe aap jis agar aapko lag raha hai is location ki sabse zyada aa rahi hai iski nahi aani chahiye to ispe na wo add mention karke add kar dijiye fir uski aani dheere dheere kam ho jayengi band nahi hongi par dheere dheere aani kam hongi. Ispe click kariye.
Customer: Ek minute matlab ispe kya karu achha Aurangabad add to yaha pe likhna padega. Agar haan ji jis city ki aapko lag raha hai zyada aa rahi hai. Nahi abhi abhi jo maine ispe rakha hai Chandigarh Himachal Bengal iski lead nahi aayengi na ab to ye preferred hai. Dheere dheere aani kam ho jayengi dekhiye aapko ye do hi cheez karni hai ek to isme add karna hai jisse wo dheere dheere aani kam ho jaye. Dusra sabse most important hai aapko ye karna hai ki usme jo hai aapko jis location ki chahiye uski din mein ek do se teen valid zaroor consume karni hai to aani aapki daily basis pe wo sabse zyada start hongi aap khud hi change dekhiyega.
Customer: Ek mera kehna hai wo lead genuine hogi to usko to consume karenge ab bina genuine lead kaise kar lenge consume?
Executive: Nahi nahi genuine lead dijiye aisa to nahi hai sir usme ek bhi genuine nahi aayegi correct. Ab ab challo buyleads ki baat kar lete hai challo ye dekh lo challo ab aap keh rahe ho na. Buyleads pe to hum log dhyan dete hi nahi hai jo hume uthana hai wo utha lete hai hum. Ab isme jaise. Sika micro concrete 10 bag. Ab 10 bag se kya baat karoge inse? Haan ji. Hai na? Ye bhi theek hai. 10 bag kitne ka aata hai? 4000 ka. Correct. Theek hai? 10 bag se 10 bag quantity usme kya kar 30 bag 30 kg. Ha ab 30 order value mein aap chahiye aapko us order value mein lagaiye na dekhiye agar maan lijiye main ye keh rahi hu ki paanch hi lead aa rahi hai Delhi ki aapko Delhi ki chahiye usme se koi ek to hogi jo kaam ki hogi. Aise hi kariye. A.P.P membrane maine bahut pehle isko hata rakha hai are pata nahi kyu aati rehti hai A.P.P membrane kisne daal rakha hai pata nahi chalta mujhe. Wo aati rahengi tab tak wo aapke consumption behavior pe aati hai aapko na zyada se zyada profile pe active reh ke usko jaldi se jaldi fresh lead consume karni hai. Hmm. Aisa nahi hai ki change nahi hoga issue aa raha hai aapko samajh rahi hu but thoda sa aap jo main keh rahi hu discussion hum kar rahe hai uspe focus kijiyega to zaroor change hoga. Madam jab sunoge kuch aayega tab to karega insan consume kuch aayega hi nahi kya consume kar loge aap batao. Kuch aana to chahiye na. Ek do lead to hogi na aisa to nahi hai ab yaha pe show kar rahi hai ki ek bhi lead nahi hai usme check to kijiye ek baar. Nahi nahi hai koi lead nahi hai aap sirf batao challo aap one to one baat kar lo challo madam abhi jo leads hai usme aap dekh lo challo. 10 kilo 10 bag 30 kilo theek hai? Aapko jis quantity mein chahiye wo upar filter use kariye. Kaha filter use kare? Order value mein aapko kitna chahiye usme filter use kijiye ki inka order value agar kam hai to. Minimum order value kam se kam 5 lakh rupees. Ye lo. Kar diya maine. Ab above 1 lakh mein click kar dijiye na waha pe. 5 lakh click karunga na 5 lakh kyu nahi dikha raha? Isse above 1 lakh pe kar dijiye agar aapko isko karna hai. Custom custom nahi ho pa raha hai isme aise hi madam. Koi issue aa raha hoga abhi na is category mein may be is wale option ki available nahi hogi. But aa jayegi bulb wala bhi aapne lagaya hua hai. Haan bulb laga rakha hai maine pehle se hi. Promotion log laga diya delete se. Humne bas nahi hai to isliye kar rakha hai. Abhi is category ki available nahi hai but sir. Hamara kehna kya hai madam ki lead kam aaye hume koi issue nahi hai usme koi dikkat nahi hai mujhe but ye galat jagah wali na aati rahe bas ye hamara kehna ye hota hai. Kam do aap koi dikkat nahi hai mujhe. Kam se kam aaye hum tabhi hum sweekar kar lenge koi dikkat nahi hai mujhe. Ye jo ye jo Karnataka aur Bengal pata nahi kaha kaha chalta rehta hai uska kya matlab hai? Sir usko na hum aisa nahi kar sakte dekhiye agar hamari side pe aisa option hota ki hum aapko ek hi uski bhi de to hum aapko aise pareshan karke daily daily call karke kyu hi karte hum direct wahi na kar dete. Haan nahi madam. But iske sirf options hai wo hum aapko bata sakte hai wo genuine option hai. Aaj tak mujhe yahi samajh mein nahi aaya baki to samajh mein aa gaya IndiaMART ka sara system samajh mein aa gaya. Mujhe samajh mein yahi nahi aaya challo hum hum jo chhod dete hai ki bhaiya ye mat karna wo zaroor hoga. Baki ab dekho ek do teen char humne kar diya. Haan ji. Iske alawa sare iske alawa sare aayenge. Samajh rahi hu. Abhi jo main aapko bola na ki ek location ki aap din mein agar aapko ek bhi dikhti hai us particular location ki consume kariye aur main do teen din ke baad aapko na follow up ke liye dobara se call karungi. Chaliye chaliye aapke kehne pe kaam karta hu jo aa rahe hai unhi ko contact kar leta hu khatam usse sahi usse chhote bade chahe jo bhi ho hai na? Haan ji madam. Haan theek hai koi baat nahi koi baat nahi kharab hai koi dikkat nahi. Aur ye leads hum karenge na contact by us kar lenge na isko? Contact by us pe click karoge waha pe contact ki sari details aa jayengi. Hmm. Dekhiye yaha se send reply aap kar sakte ho. Bas send reply kar diya. Continue chat waha se jo LMS ka option hai na lead manager ka waha se reply kar sakte ho unko. Theek hai. Bada padhe likhe to kar lete hai koi dikkat nahi chaliye. Par dekhiye ek do us location ki kijiye jisko aapko chahiye baki main aapko do teen din baad fir se follow up ke liye call karungi aap bataiyega changes hai ya nahi fir se hum coordinate karenge. Theek hai theek hai no issue madam no issue koi dikkat nahi. Theek hai baki jo aapne jo aaj ki date mein complaint raise ki hai wo main close kar du? Main jaise RMC concrete hai iska koi matlab nahi hai mere liye. Concrete isme matlab nahi hai ye sab ke sab kyu aa rahe hai mere paas ye samajh mein nahi aa raha mujhe. Matlab product ki location kahi galat aa raha hai na product mein bhi galat aa raha hai category mein. Product product bhi galat aa raha hai location bhi galat hai product bhi galat hai. To uske liye na fir hum ek kaam karte hai agar product aur category dono hi galat usme bhi issue aa raha hai fir location ka to maine bata diya hai. Agar product mein bhi issue aa raha hai to hum ek kaam karte hai product mein kuch mapping wagera category change kar lete hai agar usme issue hai may be ho sakta hai category theek hai? Product mein bhi usme hum ek baar category mein check karke apni side se aap khud se bhi ek baar category check kar lijiyega main apni side se bhi check karke jo bhi mapping change karna hoga uske according main kar lungi. Tarun fiber ye much pro important concrete building repair structure repair commercial structure RCC projecting RCC repairing residential building theek hai. Dekhiye product mein agar kuch category aap keh rahe ho na ki product mein bhi galat aa raha hai. Product to sahi chal raha hai madam. Theek hai wo kya raha hai. Achha. Nahi nahi agar aisa hai ki aapka product se different product ki wo aa rahi hai buylead to fir hum product ki mapping aur category bhi check karenge usme changes karenge taaki product ki fir sahi aaye uske liye main bol rahi hu aap mujhe bataiye product galat hai ye? Product sare sahi chal rahe hai na product sahi chal rahe hai but wo. Theek hai. To ek baar na main khud se bhi go through kar lungi product aur category mein aur aap jo maine aapko discuss kiya ek baar wo aap continue rakhiye baki main do teen din baad aapse dobara se connect karungi theek hai? Bilkul bilkul madam okay madam. Aapki jo complaint hai wo main close kar du jo subah raise kari hui hai? Kar dijiye kar dijiye kar dijiye. And aapko na next time se jo bhi issue aata hai aap is number pe WhatsApp pe connect kar sakte ho ya call kar sakte ho isi number pe kijiyega main aapka account manage kar rahi hu. Done done done. Theek hai aur aapko na wo complaint jo close karungi uske baad mail pe na wo jayega feedback ke liye to aap usme satisfied mark kar dijiyega fir wo update ho jayega theek hai? Bilkul bilkul. Okay thank you sir main dobara.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants leads from specific locations only.

- Receiving irrelevant leads from other locations.

- Product category is incorrect for some leads.



Resolution:

- Explained how to use filters for locations.

- Advised to consume leads from desired locations.

- Suggested adding unwanted locations to 'not preferred'.

- Offered to check and correct product category mapping.

- Agreed to follow up in 2-3 days.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will follow up in 2-3 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, filters, product category, not preferred
